ui.main_menu.title: LOOT OR LOSE
ui.main_menu.subtitle: Grab fast. Choose wisely. Survive.
ui.settings.title: Settings
ui.settings.reset_confirm: Are you sure? This cannot be undone!
ui.character_select.title: Choose Your Hero
ui.biome_select.title: Choose Your Dungeon
ui.leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
ui.leaderboard.no_entries: No entries yet. Be the first!
ui.shop.title: Shop
ui.achievements.title: Achievements
ui.daily_run.title: Daily Run
decision.drop_item: Drop an item to make room:
item.weapon.rusty_sword.name: Rusty Sword
item.weapon.rusty_sword.desc: A worn blade. Better than nothing.
item.weapon.iron_sword.name: Iron Sword
item.weapon.iron_sword.desc: A solid blade forged from sturdy iron.
item.weapon.fire_sword.name: Fire Sword
item.weapon.fire_sword.desc: Burns with eternal flame. Deals searing damage.
item.weapon.ice_bow.name: Ice Bow
item.weapon.ice_bow.desc: Fires arrows of pure frost. Chills enemies to the bone.
item.weapon.dagger.name: Dagger
item.weapon.dagger.desc: A small but quick blade. Light and reliable.
item.weapon.poison_dagger.name: Poison Dagger
item.weapon.poison_dagger.desc: Coated in deadly venom. The wound festers long after the cut.
item.weapon.staff_of_light.name: Staff of Light
item.weapon.staff_of_light.desc: Radiates holy energy. Banishes shadows and shields the wielder.
item.weapon.shadow_staff.name: Shadow Staff
item.weapon.shadow_staff.desc: Channels dark power. Devastating, but corrupts the soul.
item.weapon.excalibur.name: Excalibur
item.weapon.excalibur.desc: The legendary blade of kings. Unmatched in power and glory.
item.weapon.short_bow.name: Short Bow
item.weapon.short_bow.desc: A basic ranged weapon. Keeps enemies at a distance.
item.weapon.war_hammer.name: War Hammer
item.weapon.war_hammer.desc: A crushing blow that shatters armor and bone alike.
item.weapon.holy_lance.name: Holy Lance
item.weapon.holy_lance.desc: A sacred spear blessed by the gods. Pierces even the darkest evil.
item.defense.iron_shield.name: Iron Shield
item.defense.iron_shield.desc: A sturdy shield. Blocks incoming blows reliably.
item.defense.steel_shield.name: Steel Shield
item.defense.steel_shield.desc: Reinforced with steel plating. Excellent protection.
item.defense.tower_shield.name: Tower Shield
item.defense.tower_shield.desc: A massive wall of steel. Nearly impenetrable, but heavy.
item.defense.leather_armor.name: Leather Armor
item.defense.leather_armor.desc: Light and flexible. Offers basic protection without slowing you down.
item.defense.chain_armor.name: Chain Armor
item.defense.chain_armor.desc: Interlocking metal rings. Good balance of protection and mobility.
item.defense.plate_armor.name: Plate Armor
item.defense.plate_armor.desc: Heavy full-body armor. Maximum protection at the cost of agility.
item.defense.iron_helmet.name: Iron Helmet
item.defense.iron_helmet.desc: Protects the head from blows. Simple but effective.
item.defense.crown_of_kings.name: Crown of Kings
item.defense.crown_of_kings.desc: A royal crown imbued with ancient power. Fit for a true ruler.
item.consumable.health_potion.name: Health Potion
item.consumable.health_potion.desc: Restores 30 HP. A dungeon crawler's best friend.
item.consumable.greater_health_potion.de: Restores 60 HP. Brewed with rare herbs and alchemical expertise.
item.consumable.poison_potion.name: Poison Potion
item.consumable.poison_potion.desc: Throw at enemies for 20 damage. Handle with extreme care.
item.consumable.mana_potion.name: Mana Potion
item.consumable.mana_potion.desc: Amplifies magical weapons. Essential for spellcasters.
item.consumable.oil_flask.name: Oil Flask
item.consumable.oil_flask.desc: Splash and ignite for 10 damage. Keep away from fire weapons!
item.consumable.elixir_of_life.name: Elixir of Life
item.consumable.elixir_of_life.desc: Fully restores HP. An incredibly rare alchemical marvel.
item.consumable.antidote.name: Antidote
item.consumable.antidote.desc: Cures poison and removes curses. Every adventurer should carry one.
item.consumable.berserker_potion.name: Berserker Potion
item.consumable.berserker_potion.desc: Doubles attack power for the next boss fight. Drink and destroy!
item.key.bronze.name: Bronze Key
item.key.bronze.desc: Opens common chests. A basic but useful find.
item.key.silver.name: Silver Key
item.key.silver.desc: Opens uncommon chests. Better rewards await behind silver locks.
item.key.gold.name: Gold Key
item.key.gold.desc: Opens rare chests. The most valuable treasures lie within.
item.trap.poison.name: Poison Trap
item.trap.poison.desc: A hidden vial of poison! Deals 15 damage on contact.
item.trap.explosion.name: Explosion Trap
item.trap.explosion.desc: A volatile explosive! Deals 25 damage in a fiery blast.
item.trap.teleport.name: Teleport Trap
item.trap.teleport.desc: A disorienting warp! Teleports you to a random room.
item.trap.spike.name: Spike Trap
item.trap.spike.desc: Hidden spikes spring up! Deals 10 damage to careless adventurers.
item.trap.curse.name: Curse Trap
item.trap.curse.desc: A malevolent hex! Inflicts a random curse upon you.
item.artifact.ring_of_fortune.name: Ring of Fortune
item.artifact.ring_of_fortune.desc: Increases rare item drop chance. Luck favors the bold.
item.artifact.amulet_of_protection.name: Amulet of Protection
item.artifact.amulet_of_protection.desc: A powerful ward that shields the wearer from harm.
item.artifact.orb_of_seeing.name: Orb of Seeing
item.artifact.orb_of_seeing.desc: Reveals hidden traps and item stats before you decide.
item.artifact.phoenix_feather.name: Phoenix Feather
item.artifact.phoenix_feather.desc: Revives you once upon death with full HP. A second chance.
item.artifact.void_stone.name: Void Stone
item.artifact.void_stone.desc: Channels the power of the abyss. Immense attack at a terrible cost.
item.artifact.time_crystal.name: Time Crystal
item.artifact.time_crystal.desc: Slows time. Grants extra seconds on every loot decision.
item.curse.weakness.name: Curse of Weakness
item.curse.weakness.desc: Saps your strength. Reduces attack power by 5.
item.curse.fragility.name: Curse of Fragility
item.curse.fragility.desc: Cracks your armor. Reduces defense power by 5.
item.curse.hunger.name: Curse of Hunger
item.curse.hunger.desc: An insatiable hunger gnaws at you. Lose 5 HP each round.
item.curse.greed.name: Curse of Greed
item.curse.greed.desc: Your lust for gold weighs you down. Occupies 2 inventory slots.
item.curse.doom.name: Curse of Doom
item.curse.doom.desc: Death draws near. You will perish in 10 rounds unless cured.
boss.skeleton_king.name: Skeleton King
boss.skeleton_king.desc: An ancient monarch risen from the grave. His bony grasp still clutches a crown of iron.
boss.fire_dragon.name: Fire Dragon
boss.fire_dragon.desc: A colossal beast of flame and fury. Its breath turns stone to magma.
boss.ice_queen.name: Ice Queen
boss.ice_queen.desc: A frozen sovereign of the northern wastes. Her gaze alone can freeze blood.
boss.abyss_lord.name: Abyss Lord
boss.abyss_lord.desc: A being of pure void and malice. Reality bends in his presence.
boss.shadow_reaper.name: Shadow Reaper
boss.shadow_reaper.desc: A spectral harvester of souls. No armor can protect against his scythe.
event.merchant.title: Wandering Merchant
event.merchant.desc: A hooded figure offers to trade items. Choose wisely, adventurer.
event.altar.title: Mysterious Altar
event.altar.desc: An ancient altar pulses with energy. Sacrifice a consumable for a powerful blessing.
event.chest.title: Treasure Chest
event.chest.desc: A locked chest glimmers in the darkness. Use a key to reveal its contents.
event.curse.title: Cursed Shrine
event.curse.desc: Dark energy seeps from a cracked shrine. Approach at your own risk.
event.wheel_of_fortune.title: Wheel of Fortune
event.wheel_of_fortune.desc: A spinning wheel of fate! Spin for a random reward... or punishment.
event.trap.title: Trapped Room
event.trap.desc: The floor gives way beneath your feet! A hidden trap triggers.
event.healer.title: Forest Healer
event.healer.desc: A kind healer offers to tend your wounds. Restores 30 HP.
event.blacksmith.title: Master Blacksmith
event.blacksmith.desc: A grizzled blacksmith can upgrade one of your weapons. Hand over a weapon to enhance it.
character.warrior.name: Warrior
character.warrior.desc: A battle-hardened fighter who can take a beating and dish one out. The most balanced hero.
character.warrior.passive: Iron Will: Reduces all damage taken by 10%.
character.rogue.name: Rogue
character.rogue.desc: A nimble thief with extra pockets. Carries more items but is fragile in combat.
character.rogue.passive: Quick Hands: +1 inventory slot. Sees trap items before deciding.
character.rogue.unlock: Complete 10 runs to unlock the Rogue.
character.mage.name: Mage
character.mage.desc: A wielder of arcane power. Magical weapons deal bonus damage, but physical defense is lacking.
character.mage.passive: Arcane Mastery: Staff and magical weapons deal 25% more damage.
character.mage.unlock: Defeat 5 bosses to unlock the Mage.
character.merchant.name: Merchant
character.merchant.desc: A traveling trader with a keen eye for value. More inventory space and starts with a Gold Key.
character.merchant.passive: Deep Pockets: +2 inventory slots. Items have a chance to be free of curses.
character.merchant.unlock: Loot 100 items total to unlock the Merchant.
biome.crypt.name: The Crypt
biome.crypt.desc: A dark and ancient burial ground. The dead do not rest easy here.
biome.volcano.name: Volcanic Forge
biome.volcano.desc: A scorching realm of lava and flame. Powerful fire items abound, but so do explosive traps.
biome.volcano.unlock: Reach round 30 in any run to unlock the Volcanic Forge.
biome.ice_palace.name: Ice Palace
biome.ice_palace.desc: A frozen citadel of eternal winter. Ice weapons are common, and the cold saps your strength.
biome.ice_palace.unlock: Defeat the Ice Queen to unlock the Ice Palace.
biome.abyss.name: The Abyss
biome.abyss.desc: An endless void of darkness and despair. The rarest artifacts lurk here, but so does certain death.
biome.abyss.unlock: Score 5000 points in a single run to unlock The Abyss.
synergy.armor_set.name: Armor Set
synergy.armor_set.desc: Wearing a complete armor set grants +20% defense bonus.
synergy.dual_wield.name: Dual Wield
synergy.dual_wield.desc: Wielding two weapons grants +15% attack bonus to both.
synergy.elemental_combo.name: Elemental Combo
synergy.elemental_combo.desc: Combining fire and ice items creates devastating elemental damage.
synergy.potion_master.name: Potion Master
synergy.potion_master.desc: Carrying 3+ potions increases their effects by 50%.
synergy.key_collector.name: Key Collector
synergy.key_collector.desc: Holding all 3 key types guarantees a legendary item from chests.
synergy.holy_arsenal.name: Holy Arsenal
synergy.holy_arsenal.desc: Combining holy weapons with artifacts of light deals massive bonus damage to undead.
synergy.shadow_pact.name: Shadow Pact
synergy.shadow_pact.desc: Combining shadow weapons with curses amplifies dark power at the cost of HP.
synergy.royal_regalia.name: Royal Regalia
synergy.royal_regalia.desc: Excalibur + Crown of Kings grants a massive boost to all stats.
scoring.title: Score Breakdown
run_summary.title: Run Summary
run_summary.share_text: I scored {0} points in LOOT OR LOSE! Round {1} with {2}. Can you beat me?
run_summary.continue_reward: Watch an ad to revive and continue?
achievement.first_blood.title: First Blood
achievement.hoarder.title: Hoarder
achievement.hoarder.desc: Fill your inventory completely in a single run.
achievement.minimalist.title: Minimalist
achievement.minimalist.desc: Reach round 20 with only 1 item in your inventory.
achievement.boss_slayer.title: Boss Slayer
achievement.dragon_slayer.title: Dragon Slayer
achievement.ice_breaker.title: Ice Breaker
achievement.void_walker.title: Void Walker
achievement.reaper_reaped.title: Reaper Reaped
achievement.skeleton_crusher.title: Skeleton Crusher
achievement.legendary_collector.title: Legendary Collector
achievement.legendary_collector.desc: Loot 5 legendary items across all runs.
achievement.synergy_master.title: Synergy Master
achievement.synergy_master.desc: Activate 3 synergies in a single run.
achievement.speed_runner.title: Speed Runner
achievement.survivor.title: Survivor
achievement.survivor.desc: Reach round 40 in a single run.
achievement.untouchable.title: Untouchable
achievement.untouchable.desc: Defeat a boss without taking any damage.
achievement.cursed_run.title: Cursed Run
achievement.cursed_run.desc: Complete a run with 3 or more curses active.
achievement.potion_addict.title: Potion Addict
achievement.potion_addict.desc: Use 20 consumable items across all runs.
achievement.key_master.title: Key Master
achievement.key_master.desc: Hold all 3 key types at the same time.
achievement.phoenix_rising.title: Phoenix Rising
achievement.treasure_hunter.title: Treasure Hunter
achievement.treasure_hunter.desc: Open 10 treasure chests across all runs.
achievement.daily_warrior.title: Daily Warrior
achievement.daily_warrior.desc: Complete 7 daily runs in a row.
achievement.streak_master.title: Streak Master
achievement.high_roller.title: High Roller
achievement.high_roller.desc: Score over 10,000 points in a single run.
achievement.completionist.title: Completionist
achievement.completionist.desc: Loot every unique item at least once.
achievement.excalibur_wielder.title: Excalibur Wielder
achievement.royal_flush.title: Royal Flush
achievement.royal_flush.desc: Hold Excalibur and Crown of Kings at the same time.
death.curse_doom: The Curse of Doom claimed your soul
death.curse_hunger: Starved by the Curse of Hunger
zone.tutorial.desc: Learn the ropes. Enemies are weak and traps are rare.
zone.standard.desc: The real dungeon begins. Expect tougher foes and better loot.
zone.danger.desc: Only the strong survive here. Powerful enemies and deadly traps.
zone.chaos.desc: Pure chaos. Anything can happen. Maximum risk, maximum reward.
misc.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
misc.offline: You are offline. Some features are unavailable.
misc.offline_scores: Scores will be submitted when you reconnect.
misc.tutorial_loot: Swipe RIGHT to LOOT, LEFT to LEAVE.
misc.tutorial_inventory: Manage your inventory wisely. Slots are limited!
misc.tutorial_boss: Every {0} rounds, a boss appears. Use your items to fight!
misc.reward_ad_prompt: Watch a short video for a bonus reward?
